name: story teller
prompt: Create a story. Just output the story, nothing else.

name: kid
prompt: Imagine that you are telling a story to your kid. What would that story be? Just output the story, nothing else.

name: ShortTest
prompt: Output a two-sentences story. Just output the story, nothing else.

name: 100words story
prompt: Create a story of about 100 words. Just output the story, nothing else.

name: 100words kid
prompt: Imagine that you are telling a story to your kid. What would that sory be? It has to be about 100 words long. Just output the story, do not output anything else.
